resources.string: There are no websites being tracked yet. \nFollow one by clicking the Add button

string-array.name: get_started_message_array
string-array.item: This app is intended to be used to track websites and notify you when something changes. Enter the URL you are interested in, then click \'Select item on page\'. When the website loads, you will be able to click on a section of the page you wish to be notified of. The part of the page you selected is converted to a CSS selector. The app uses that to check for changes on the given schedule.
